name: STRAFEMETER
description:
STRAFEMETER is a precision platformer where each input can only be used for a limited amount of time. Each level you have to manage your resources are you're constantly running out of control.

Controls:

  • A/W pr Space/D - Left, jump, and right, respectively
  • Left Arrow/Up Arrow or Space/Right Arrow - Same as above
  • 'R' to restart a level
  • Gamepads are also supported!

Made for the GMTK2020 Game Jam, with the theme "Out of Control"
